#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
	    int n,p;
	    cin>>n>>p;
	    int a=-1;
	    for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
	    {
	        int temp;
	        cin>>temp;
	        if(temp>=p)
	        a=i;
	    }
	    cout<<(a+1)<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
